content.question: Which of the following vectors represents the impulse exerted on the ball by the floor?

choices.label: The figure shows an arrow pointing vertically downward.
The figure shows an arrow pointing vertically upward.
The figure shows an arrow pointing upward and to the right.
The figure shows an arrow pointing downward and to the right.

content.answer: The figure shows an arrow pointing vertically upward.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
